video.title: Ninja Turtles: The Next Mutation
video.synopsis: Everyone's favorite teenage mutants are back in live action to fight crime with help from a new ninja turtle -- a female named Venus De Milo.

episodes.synopsis: Vowing to stop Dragon Lord, Shredder's evil successor, wise Master Chung tells his daughter that she must join the Ninja Turtles to save humankind.
episodes.title: East Meets West: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Venus De Milo arrives in New York and introduces herself to the Turtles. Then she reveals that she too was dropped into the toxic sludge at birth.
episodes.title: East Meets West: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Venus leads the Turtles in meditation to help Splinter escape from his dream state, after which they practice martial arts to enter the Dream Realm.
episodes.title: East Meets West: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Turtles barely escaped the last time they were confronted by Dragon Lord. Now their nemesis has stolen the coveted Serum of Invincibility!
episodes.title: East Meets West: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Donatello and Venus have very different ideas regarding how to neutralize the Serum of Invincibility.
episodes.title: East Meets West: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: Dragon Lord reaches through the time warp to steal the Staff of Bu-Ki, an ancient relic with the power to destroy any and all shinobi spell-casters.
episodes.title: The Staff of Bu-Ki

episodes.synopsis: When a series of high-profile bank robberies ravage New York City, the Turtles choose not to get involved right away.
episodes.title: Silver and Gold

episodes.synopsis: One of Donatello's biggest idols in the world of science, Dr. Quease, is kidnapped by the dragons.
episodes.title: Meet Dr. Quease

episodes.synopsis: While on an early-morning sewer jog, the Turtles discover a rare baby Turtle in the underground storage house of crazy poacher Simon Bonesteel.
episodes.title: All in the Family

episodes.synopsis: When Dragon Lord and Dr. Quease have an argument, Quease propositions Donatello, because he thinks they should work together.
episodes.title: Trusting Dr. Quease

episodes.synopsis: When Michaelangelo finds a winning lottery ticket, he thinks his sewer days are over. But the others have already dreamt of ways to spend the money!
episodes.title: Windfall

episodes.synopsis: After an encounter with Bonesteel, Mikey comes up with an idea -- an all-night rave for animal rights where everybody dresses as their favorite beast.
episodes.title: Turtles Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes have a hard time sorting out who's who when their evil counterparts start popping up everywhere -- and they all look like the Turtles.
episodes.title: Mutant Reflections

episodes.synopsis: The dragons are tired of Dragon Lord's oppressive regime, and want to help the Turtles send him back into the mirror. Are they for real?
episodes.title: Truce or Consequence

episodes.synopsis: As Donatello is scanning the Web for information, someone breaks into his computer and sends him a coded message -- one that reprograms Donny's brain!
episodes.title: Sewer Crash

episodes.synopsis: Raphael is enjoying one of his favorite pastimes -- harassing crazed poacher Simon Bonesteel -- when a platoon of Rank warriors join in the game.
episodes.title: Going Ape

episodes.synopsis: When the Turtles stumble upon a man being attacked by dragons in Central Park, they are shocked to learn they've rescued someone from their past!
episodes.title: Enemy of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: When an alchemy accident gives Wick telekinetic powers, he not only uses it over the Dragon Lord, but he puts the Ninja Turtles to the test too!
episodes.title: King Wick

episodes.synopsis: When Venus's life is saved by one of the Dragon Lord's Rank warriors, the Turtles are forced to re-examine their views on dragons.
episodes.title: The Good Dragon

episodes.synopsis: When his apartment burns down, Splinter's chess opponent moves in with the Turtles for a few days.
episodes.title: The Guest

episodes.synopsis: The continuing conflict between Raphael and Donatello comes to a head... again. This time, however, Mike and Leonardo get dragged into it.
episodes.title: Like Brothers

episodes.synopsis: While the Turtles are busy evading Bonesteel, an old enemy of Chung I's arrives in New York to destroy Chung I's former student: Venus.
episodes.title: Unchain My Heart: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Raphael and the Turtles go against the wishes of Venus and Splinter and return Vam Mi's heart. Yet the vampires are determined to destroy Venus.
episodes.title: Unchain My Heart: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bonesteel is sick and tired of the immortal bloodsuckers getting in the way of his efforts to capture the Turtles.
episodes.title: Unchain My Heart: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: With the Turtles being held hostage by Bonesteel, it's up to Splinter and Venus to defeat the vampires once and for all.
episodes.title: Unchain My Heart: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: When Venus accidentally traps someone in a forcefield, they begin to question her value to the team, recounting her numerous mistakes in the past.
episodes.title: Who Needs Her
